about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains themes and imagery that some may find disturbing. 

Foss Park  is a psychological horror visual novel that takes you deep into the fractured mind of a nameless patient in an unsettling mental hospital. You awaken with no memory of how you arrived, haunted by fleeting images of a life destroyed—a house fire, a lost family, and echoes of a forgotten tragedy.

Guided—or tormented—by a cryptic Doctor, you must navigate your reality, answer probing and disturbing questions, and piece together the truth. 

Features:

  • Interactive Narrative: Answer deeply personal and morally ambiguous questions that shape the story’s outcome.

  • Dynamic Narrative: Your choices matter and events will change on each of your play throughs. 

  • Multiple Endings: Experience vastly different conclusions based on your choices—ranging from redemption and salvation to punishment and despair.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in a chilling environment filled with surreal imagery, unsettling soundscapes, and psychological tension.

  • Existential Dread: Uncover the mystery behind your existence, humanity's flaws, and the ultimate plan for our world.

WARNING: This game contains themes and imagery that some may find disturbing.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains themes and imagery that some may find disturbing

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: Foss Park

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 64-bit Intel-compatible CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11 graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
